channel.title: Rob Ford on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Rob Ford on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: A tale of two Toronto mayors: @ToMayorFrod and @ToMayorFord
item.description: Toronto, Ontario is coated in ice tonight. A severe winter ice storm slowing the city to a slippery crawl, with widespread power outages. It's a city in crisis. Mayor Rob Frod of Toronto is not the Mayor of Toronto; it's a Twitter parody account, prepared for the purpose of poking fun at Mayor Rob Ford. A tale of two different worlds: One a joke and the other reality: @TOMayorFord and @TOMayorFrod The later proving the difference.
